product_name: Aqua Sphere Kayenne Jr. Swim Goggles - Boys'
long_description: The boys' Aqua Sphere Kayenne Jr. swim goggles provide clear, fog-free vision for your young swimmer's sessions in the pool or lake. Scratch-resistant Plexisol(R) synthetic resin lenses help keep vision clear with their antifog properties, and they offer 100% UVA and UVB protection. Lenses provide 180deg of visibility; clear lenses work especially well indoors or on overcast days outdoors. Quick-Fit Buckle(TM) allows easy adjustments while he's wearing the goggles. The Aqua Sphere Kayenne Jr. swim goggles feature a stabilizing nose bridge that helps keep the fit secure and comfortable.
short_description: The boys' Aqua Sphere Kayenne Jr. swim goggles provide clear, fog-free vision for your young swimmer's sessions in the pool or lake.
